Package de.lases.business.service

Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.service.ReviewService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Dependent public class ReviewService extends Object implements Serializable
Provides functionality for dealing with reviews of submission papers. In case of an unexpected state, a UIMessage event will be fired.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • addReview

      public void addReview​(Submission submission, Review review, File file, User reviewer)
      Adds a review to a submission.

      The review will always be added to the latest paper. It has to be submitted within the given timeline and one reviewer can onl submit one review per paper.

      Parameters:
      submission - The submission to which the review is submitted.
      review - The review that is submitted.
      file - The file containing the pdf review itself.
      reviewer - The reviewer attempting to submit.

    • removeReview

      public void removeReview​(Review review)
      Removes a review.
      Parameters:
      review - The review that is to be removed.

    • getReviews

      public List<Review> getReviews​(Submission submission, User user)
      Gets all reviews that can be viewed by a given user. For example, a reviewer can only view his own reviews.
      Parameters:
      submission - The submission from which the reviews are requested.
      user - The user who requests to see the reviews.
      Returns:
      The requested reviews, which the given user is allowed to view.

    • downloadFile

      public File downloadFile​(Review review)
      Gets the file containing the reviews pdf.
      Parameters:
      review - The review containing the requested file.
      Returns:
      The requested file.
